description:
Apple's interview with YouTuber Marques Brownlee about repairability has been called "propaganda" and "lies" by Louis Rossmann. Will Apple be able to... repair their image?

Marques Brownlee's Interview: https://youtu.be/8reaJG7z-is?si=ny0e2Ywctyr2Gy7X
Louis Rossmann's Response: https://youtu.be/Z0DF-MOkotA?si=OhdfQsAu3vSd2916

Me trying to fix my MacBook Pro: https://youtu.be/C0o5BrBSUSM?si=YWAsNV_9yZX3YABs

title: Apple Reacts to Repair “Propaganda” Claims
